oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of conformationally constrained alpha-amino acid derivatives containing bicyclo[2.2.2] unit via the Diels-Alder and Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reactions as key steps
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
MESHRAM, M
MUTHUSAMY, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 9-SUBSTITUTED ANTHRACENES
PALLADIUM CATALYSTS
2-ACETAMIDOACRYLATE
BROMINATION
METATHESIS
TRIBROMIDE
DIVERSITY
PEPTIDES
HALIDES
Bicyclic alpha-amino acid derivatives
glycine equivalent
anthracene derivatives
Diels-Alder reaction
Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction
Buchwald ligand
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple route to synthesize conformationally constrained a-amino acid (AAA) derivatives containing bicyclo[2.2.2]octane ring-system has been devised. Diels-Alder reaction is chosen to assemble highly constrained AAA derivatives and the scope of the methodology is further expanded by Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction with various boronic acids.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 54(4)505-513
